fullForm: Birla Institute of Technology and Science Admission Test
eligibility: Eligibility criteria as per BITSAT 2025 brochure: Candidates must have passed the 12th examination from a recognized Central or State board or its equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics (PCM) and adequate proficiency in English. For admission to B.Pharm, candidates must have passed 12th with Physics, Chemistry, and Biology (PCB) and adequate proficiency in English. Candidates appearing for 12th examination in 2025 or who have passed 12th in 2024 are eligible to appear for BITSAT 2025. Further details are available in the official brochure.
negativeMarking: 1 mark deducted for every incorrect answer

faqs.question: What is the marking scheme for BITSAT?
faqs.answer: Each correct answer is awarded 3 marks. 1 mark is deducted for every incorrect answer. No marks are awarded or deducted for unattempted questions.
